tag_list: kiran-puttur, crowd-sourcing, enterprenuer, opencl, opengl, graphics, coder, social-coding, storage-specialist
overview:
Kiran Puttur is born and brought up in suburbs of south India. He holds Bachelors degree in Electrical and Electronics from University of Mysore and Masters Degree in Software Engineering from Brandeis University.

He is been doing software development for more than 9 years now. In the past he has worked with Dell, Mphasis(Now part of Hewlett Packard). He currently works for Storage Company (http://www.emc.com) located in Massachusetts.

Kiran devotes lot of attention doing social coding and developing crowd sourcing application. His interests lies in distributed computing, cloud computing, cloud storage.scale out NAS solutions, Apps development, widgets development for business interactions.

degrees.subject: C, Java, UML, SOA, Design, TCP/IP,XML,
